sen.j: 観世 清和（かんぜ きよかず、1959年（昭和34年）5月21日 -）は、シテ方観世流能楽師。
sen.e: Kiyokazu KANZE (May 21, 1959 -) is a leading traditional Japanese Noh drama performer and member of the Kanze school (one of the 5 major Noh troupes).
Kiyokazu KANZE (May 21, 1959 -) is a leading traditional Japanese Noh drama performer and member of the Kanze school (one of the 5 major Noh troupes).
Kiyokazu KANZE (May 21, 1959 -) is a leading traditional Japanese Noh drama performer (shite-kata) and member of the Kanze school (one of the 5 major Noh troupes).

sen.j: 二十六世観世宗家で当代。
sen.e: Kiyokazu is the 26th hereditary head of the KANZE family.
Kiyokazu is the 26th hereditary head of the KANZE family.
Kiyokazu is the 26th hereditary head of the KANZE family.
Kiyokazu is Motomasa KANZE`s eldest son.
Kiyokazu is Motomasa KANZE`s eldest son.
Kiyokazu is Motomasa KANZE's eldest son.

sen.j: 父に師事し、1964年4歳の時「鞍馬天狗」花見で初舞台。
sen.e: Kiyokazu studied under his father and in 1964 at the age of 4 treaded the boards in the world of Noh for the first time in the production of the Robin Hood like play 'Kurama Tengu'.
Kiyokazu studied under his father and in 1964 at the age of 4 treaded the boards in the world of Noh for the first time in the production of the Robin Hood like play 'Kurama Tengu'.
Kiyokazu studied under his father and in 1964 at the age of 4 treaded the boards in the world of Noh for the first time in the production of the Robin Hood like play 'Kurama Tengu.'

sen.j: 東京芸術大学音楽学部邦楽科別科を卒業。
sen.e: Graduated from the Traditional Japanse Music Department in the Music Faculty of Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music.
Graduated from the Traditional Japanse Music Department in the Music Faculty of Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music.
Graduated from the Special Course of the Department of Traditional Japanese Music in the Music Faculty of Tokyo University of the Arts.
sen.cmt: 大学名を訂正別科はSpecial courseとしました。http://www.weblio.jp/content/%E6%9D%B1%E4%BA%AC%E8%8A%B8%E8%A1%93%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6#.E5.A4.A7.E5.AD.A6.E5.88.A5.E7.A7.91.EF.BC.88.E9.9F.B3.E6.A5.BD.E5.AD.A6.E9.83.A8.EF.BC.89

sen.e: Inherited the role of head of the family in September 1990.
Inherited the role of head of the family in September 1990.
Inherited the role of head of the family in September 1990.
In 1995 Kiyokazu papered in productions of: 'Matsura Sayohime' (Princess Sayo of Matsura` and 'Unoha' (Cormorant Plumes).
In 1995 Kiyokazu papered in productions of: 'Matsura Sayohime' (Princess Sayo of Matsura` and 'Unoha' (Cormorant Plumes).
In 1995 Kiyokazu papered in productions of: 'Matsura Sayohime' (Princess Sayo of Matsura) and 'Unoha' (Feathers of Cormorant).

sen.j: 1995年度芸術選奨文部大臣新人賞受賞。
sen.e: In 1995 was awarded the Minister of Education`s Fine Arts Newcomer Award.
In 1995 was awarded the Minister of Education`s Fine Arts Newcomer Award.
In 1995 was awarded the new face award of Minister of Education Award for Fine Arts.

sen.j: 1983年のフランスをはじめ、アメリカ、インド、中国など海外公演に多数参加。
sen.e: In 1983 (France) participated in his first of many (US, India, PRC etc) overseas performances.
In 1983 (France) participated in his first of many (US, India, PRC etc) overseas performances.
He has participated in many overseas performances starting with France in 1983, and followed by US, India, China and so on.
sen.cmt: 「はじめ」の解釈が間違っていると思うので再構成しました。

sen.j: フランス芸術・文化勲章シュバリエ受賞。
sen.e: Won the French award of Chevalier dans l'Ordre des Arts et des Lettres.
Won the French award of Chevalier dans l'Ordre des Arts et des Lettres.
Won the French award of Chevalier dans l'Ordre des Arts et des Lettres.

sen.j: 社団法人日本能楽会常務理事。
sen.e: Executive Trustee of the Japan Nohgaku Performers Association
Executive Trustee of the Japan Nohgaku Performers Association
Executive trustee of the the Association for Japanese Noh Plays.

sen.j: 財団法人観世文庫理事長。
sen.e: Trustee of the Kanze Library
Trustee of the Kanze Library
Administrative director of the Kanze Library

sen.j: 社団法人観世会理事長。
sen.e: Trustee of the Kanze Association
Trustee of the Kanze Association
Administrative director of the Kanze Association

sen.j: 弟に山階弥右衛門、観世芳伸。
sen.e: Kiyokazu`s younger brother is Yaemon YAMASHINA, aka Yoshinobu KANZE.
Kiyokazu`s younger brother is Yaemon YAMASHINA, aka Yoshinobu KANZE.
